price: Dhagayaa! Dhugumatti, wanti samiileefi dachii keessa jiru kan Rabbiiti. Dhagayaa! Dhugumatti, waadaan Rabbii dhugaadha. Garuu irra baay’een isaanii hin beekan.
arabic: أَلَآ إِنَّ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ أَلَآ إِنَّ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٞ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: alā inna lillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi alā inna waʿda al-lahi ḥaqqun walākinna aktharahum lā yaʿlamūna
